title: Berry Salad
description: Mixed lettuce with berries, walnuts, feta cheese, red onion and our homemade sweet & tangy vinaigrette. Served with a choice of bread.

title: Cobb Salad
description: Chopped romaine with bacon, tomatoes, egg, blue cheese, and our homemade blue cheese dressing. Topped with fried onions. Served with a choice of bread.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Traditional caesar salad tossed in our homemade caesar dressing. Topped with parmesan cheese and garlic croutons. Served with a choice of bread.

title: House Sala
description: Mixed lettuce with croutons, bacon, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, cucumbers, and our homemade honey mustard. Served with a choice of bread.

title: Tamato Bisque (Bowl)
description: Tomato bisque topped with goat cheese and croutons. Served with choice of bread.

title: Tamato Bisque (Cup)
description: Tomato bisque topped with goat cheese and croutons. Served with choice of bread.

title: Chilli (Bowl)
description: Classic american chilli recipe with minced beef, tomatoes, beans and an array of spices. Served with a choice of bread.

title: Chilli (Cup)
description: Classic american chilli recipe with minced beef, tomatoes, beans and an array of spices. Served with a choice of bread.
